system.description: Starting at 6th level, when you cast find familiar, you can choose to summon a @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-monsters.Actor.og0314juj8f3fdo6]{Gelatinous Cube} or @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-monsters.Actor.tzzfyclxqsfbqtjl]{Ochre Jelly}. At 9th level, you can summon a @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-monsters.Actor.hc4zn8feye61mgsw]{Euphoria Cube} or @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-monsters.Actor.khla0l6b8fhvvzos]{Flash Jelly}.
